items.sentence: If we let our reasoning power be overshadowed by our emotions, we would be barking up the wrong tree all the time.
Since the drinks were expensive, Tom sipped his as slowly as he could while he listened to the musicians on stage.
"Where's your mother?" "My mother is at home, sir. She doesn't know I'm here. I'm not supposed to talk about her."
In no country other than England, it has been said, can one experience four seasons in the course of a single day.
If you stretch out a rod made of a ductile material, it will thin out in the middle in a process called "necking".
